text: (napiye!) Nir kuruvirak"manitarkale! Niccayamaka unkal iraivanitamiruntu unkalukku cattiya(veta)m vantuvittatu; enave yar (ataip pinparri) nerana valiyil celkiraro avar tam nanmaikkakave annervaliyil celkinrar; evar (atai erka maruttu) vali tavarinaro, niccayamaka avarka tamakkuk ketana valiyile celkirar; nan (unkalaik kattayappatutti) unkal kariyankalai nirvakikka atikaram perravanallan
